circTest
  • Reference

Plot null distribution associated to two sample test of Homogeneity

Plots the (exact or approximated) distribution of the test statistics under H0.

# S3 method for circular_test
plot(out, cex.main = 1)

Arguments

x

A circular_test object

Value

Plots the (exact or approximated) distribution of the test statistics under H0.

Examples

data(pigeons)
plot(circular_test(pigeons$experimental, pigeons$control))

  • Arguments
  • Value
